FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure CCR-terminate replay. CCR-t replay is enabled with ano shutdownof this context.If a communication failure between client and server occurs, CCR-t replay enables the retransmission of CCR-t messages for a Gx or Gy session at a configured intervals until a valid response (CCA-t) is received or until the configuredmax-lifetimeperiod expires, whichever comes first.
